sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
 
If it is given that \(p : q :: r : s \), then prove that
\[
	\frac{4p + 7q }{4r + 7s } = \frac{4p - 7q }{4r - 7s }
\]
\newline

", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
It is given that
\[
	\frac{p }{q } = \frac{r }{s }
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{4 \input[s1v1]{}}{7 q } = \frac{4 r }{7 \input[s1v2]{} }
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{4 \input[s2v1]{}+ 7 q }{4 p - 7 q } = \frac{4 \input[s2v2]{} + 7 s }{4 r - 7 s } \textrm{ {by componendo and dividendo}}
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 2, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{4 p + 7 q }{4 \input[s3v1]{} + 7 s } = \frac{4 p - 7 \input[s3v2]{} }{4 r - 7 s }
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
Hence proved.
\newline

"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": ["p", "s"], "text": "$$\text{"Upon Multiplying numerator and denominator by $4$ and $7$ respectively on both sides we get $\frac{4 p }{7 q } = \frac{4 r }{7 s }$}$$"}, {"data": ["p", "r"], "text": "$$\text{Applying componendo and dividendo rule, which states that if $ a:b :: c:d$, then $(a+b):(a-b)::(c+d):(c-d)$ to the previous equation, we get $\frac{4 p + 7 q }{4 p - 7 q } = \frac{4 r + 7 s }{4 r - 7 s }$}$$"}, {"data": ["r", "q"], "text": "$$\text{After multiplying the previous equation with $\frac{4 r + 7 s}{4 p - 7 q}$ we get, $\frac{4 p + 7 q }{4 r + 7 s } = \frac{4 p - 7 q }{4 r - 7 s}$}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
